name: Shapes (itch) (dmoger)
description:
Shapes is a game about identity. It's a game for those unsure of their identity or those who have a hard time describing who they are.

Made by Drew Moger in Construct 3.

Main menu music: "Anura" by REW from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/REW_1123/anura/anura

In-game music: "somethingdifferent" by Tea K Pea from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/tea-k-pea/single/somethingdifferent
